title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXIV, subch. B, art. 1, pt. 1221 - George Washington Bridge Bus Station
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXIV, subch. B, art. 1, pt. 1221 - George Washington Bridge Bus Station

State Regulations
§ 1221.1 - Definitions
§ 1221.2 - Use of common areas
§ 1221.3 - Entry upon court and roof areas restricted
§ 1221.4 - Delivery or removal of merchandise, materials, equipment, furnishings, etc. restricted
§ 1221.5 - Marking, drilling, painting or defacing terminal prohibited
§ 1221.6 - Obstruction of ways, windows, doors, openings, etc. admitting air or light prohibited
§ 1221.7 - Placing of articles on exterior window sills prohibited
§ 1221.8 - Use of sinks, drains, toilets, etc. for disposal of substances other than those intended prohibited
§ 1221.9 - Throwing or dropping objects from windows or down stairwells, shafts, etc. prohibited
§ 1221.10 - Cleaning, janitorial, extermination, and like contracts to be approved by superintendent
§ 1221.11 - Canvassing, peddling or solicitation in terminal prohibited
§ 1221.12 - Animals and pets of any kind barred
§ 1221.13 - Persons entering or leaving terminal when not fully open for business required to show identification
§ 1221.14 - Requests for Port Authority employees to perform work or services to be directed to superintendent
§ 1221.15 - Applicability of rules and regulations set forth in this Part

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXIV, subch. B, art. 1, pt. 1221

Statutory authority: N.Y. Laws 1921, ch. 154, art. VI and
N.J. Laws 1921, ch. 151, consented to by Congress 42 U.S. Stat. 174 [1921]; N.Y. Laws 1922, ch. 43 and N.J. Laws 1922, ch. 9, consented to by Congress 42
U.S. Stat. 822 [1922]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
